title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Scholars' Forum
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Scholars' Forum              Scholars' Forum         Scholars' Forum   In November 2015, a group of experts, including participants from Hiroshima and Nagasaki, joined Manhattan Project NHP staff in a scholars' forum on the Manhattan Project in Washington, DC. The intent of the workshop was to identify topics and aspects of the Manhattan Project that should be incorporated into the interpretive planning for the Manhattan Project National Historic Park.   Read the outcome of this forum in the Manhattan Project National Historical Park Scholars' Forum Report, November 9-10, 2015 (PDF, 3.88MB)
